values.name: set
values.code: set( ?_r : Float, ?_g : Float, ?_b : Float, ?_a : Float ) : Rectangle
values.desc: Set components of this rect, if any components is passed in as null - it will be left as is.

values.name: clone
values.desc: Create a copy of this rectangle.

values.name: x
values.desc: The x component of the rectangle

values.name: y
values.desc: The y component of the rectangle

values.name: w
values.desc: The width component of the rectangle

values.name: h
values.desc: The height component of the rectangle
